headline.main: In David Shields’s Brief Essays, People May Be Farther Than They Appear

lead_paragraph: The United States carried out at least one new air strike on al Qaeda in Yemen overnight on Monday and has waged several strikes since Saturday, U.S. officials told Reuters, keeping up the pressure on the militants after starting a new push last week.
